# shouldWrapToNextLine

**Instance Property**

Whether the text continues on the next line.

## Declaration

```swift
let shouldWrapToNextLine: Bool?
```

## Inspecting an observation

- **boundingRegion**: The bounding region of the text.
- **isTitle**: Whether this text is the title of the document.
- **recognitionLanguages**: The languages in which the recognized text was written.
- **textDirection**
- **RecognizedTextObservation.Direction**: An enum representing which direction the text is read.
- **transcript**: The top text candidate as a string.
